newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Barry Callebaut says merger complete.
newsitem.headline: Barry Callebaut says merger complete.

text.p: Barry Callebaut AG said on Wednesday the merger between Barry SA and Callebaut AG announced in July 1996 was completed and the cocoa and chocolate company would operate as a single enterprise effective immediately.
Barry Callebaut, a unit of Zurich-based Klaus J Jacobs Holding, has global sales of nearly two billion Swiss francs and employs around 3,500 people, it said in a statement.

"As of today Barry Callebaut AG is operating as a single enterprise," it said, adding Pierre Vermaut was appointed chief executive and Rudy Pachl chief operating officer. (( -- Zurich newsroom +41 1 631 7340 ))
